All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Common
This class contains commonly used enums/types in application.
Common.EXCHANGE
This enum contains the exchanges where a trading order can be executed, including NSE and BSE.
Common.ORDER_STATUS
This enum contains the various order statuses that a trading order can have,
Common.ORDER_TYPE
This enum defines the various types of trading orders that can be placed, including LIMIT and MARKET.
Common.TRANSACTION_TYPE
This enum contains the two transaction types that can occur in a trading order,
Controller
Represents a Controller class that manages a HashMap of User objects, indexed by their user ID.
ExchangeConnector
The ExchangeConnector class provides a singleton instance that can be used to connect to an exchange and place orders.
Order
An Order class that defines the properties and behavior of an order for a stock.
OrderExecutioner
The OrderExecutioner class is responsible for executing orders on an exchange by calling the ExchangeConnector's placeOrder method.
OrderManager
This class is responsible for managing the placement and execution of orders on an exchange.
OrderValidator
The OrderValidator class is responsible for validating orders for a user.
Stock
The purpose of this class is to represent a stock, which has a name, a price, and an exchange it is traded on.
User
The purpose of this class is to represent a user of the program.
